Address.value: FITZWILLIAM COURT, 1ST FLOOR,LEESON CLOSE, DUBLIN, 2, Ireland

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Iterum Therapeutics PLC is a pharmaceutical company. The company is engaged in developing and commercializing sulopenem to be the first and only oral and intravenous branded penem available globally. Its sulopenem program has the potential to offer a solution to the problem of antibiotic resistance and the toxicity limitations of existing agents.
